name: MYFX
tag_list: forex, finance, mt4, platform, trading, software, social, community
overview:
There are 3 main reasons why MYFX is considered the platform of choice by professional traders: Execution Capacity

From one-click trading, to default stop losses and take profits, OCO (Order Cancels Order), one-click breakeven, and more. MYFX brings all of the quick access features that are essential for Forex Trading. Trade Management

MYFX is known for its ability to plan and run trade management strategies. You will have controls to partially close trades at predetermined levels, move stops, become risk free, as well as have trails kick in once targets have been reached. With a market that runs 24hrs a day, professional trade management tools give you back your ability to make decisions on the market, rather than having to wait to click the buttons. This flagship feature is essential for all traders. Risk Management

With the ability to set risk as a % and MYFX work out the lot size, see the current risk per trade, and the overall risk you are managing MYFX takes retail Forex trading to the professional level. Controlling risk levels, and understanding your risk positions quickly are an integral part of successful traders tools.
